name: Stick Master 3D‏
description:
It's got fly kicks, groin kicks, machineguns, glue guns, ninja stars, bicycle kicks, spinning punches, chainsaws, headbutts, coffee drinking, and explosive diarrhea (and more).

A hyper-casual game I made at my last job.

you can see that the game evolved and changed a couple of times.

*The game is free and available on the Play Store.
